creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: maroon and cream; woven with various geometric designs:  triangles, diamonds, stars; long braided tassels at one end with balls made of thread; metal buckle at opposite end
dimension: 84 x 3 1/8 in. (213.36 x 7.94 cm) (without buckle or tassels)
title: Camel belt
